channel.title: Mein Blog

item.title: Trying out infer
item.dc:creator: theCed7
item.description:
Firstly, this blog post is ought to be an introduction to `infer`. As it turns out, this is also a great way of getting to grips with some basic statistical reasoning. So, if you're relatively new in the world of null hypotheses and boxplots, I believe this might also be a good learning opportunity.
The key question we are asking in this blog post is: _
